channel.title: Dodian Servers

item.title: Dodian Servers
item.dc:creator: @kihomura Kihomura
item.description:
@kihomura wrote:

[quote=“xstrxpurez, post:12, topic:236563”][quote author=tonypker13 link=topic=312218.msg2488393#msg2488393 date=1223953687]
Lol, I bet you could.
[/quote]

so do i =]

It’s not that hard… Even I know that. But when he said “Glitch” I wasn’t very sure.

lol, when he said glitch i was thinkin… hmm what glitch but oh well i can give him a full item.java with every item there is…

Depends on the Item8 class on the client you’re using, so I don’t think that’s possible?

actually its possible… i wasnt just talking about custom items… i ment every Jagex item… with correct fits, correct bonus’s… and all[/quote]

Yours is probably just modified for Miss Silabsoft’s item list.
